testCases.explanation: The subarray [-2,2,-8,1,7] from index 1 to 5 sums to 0 and has length 5. This is the largest such subarray.
No subarray sums to 0 since all elements are positive.
The entire array [1,-1] sums to 0 and has length 2.
A single 0 element is itself a subarray with sum 0, length 1.
The entire array [1,0,-1] sums to 0 and has length 3. Subarrays [0] (length 1) and [1,-1] (length 2) are shorter.

description: Given an array arr of integers, find the length of the largest subarray with sum equal to 0. If no such subarray exists, return 0. Uses prefix sum with a hash map for O(n) solution.
